ssml: <speak><s>Today I am very lucky.</s><s>I would like to play for the first time now.</s><s>How does it work?</s><k/speak>
<speak><s>Oh, that's a lot of possibilities.</s><s>How am I supposed to decide?</s></speak>
<speak><s>Oh, Saturday only?</s><s>?Is there an alternative, in case I don't want to wait that long?</s></speak>
<speak><s>How do I know that I have won?</s></speak>
<speak><s>That sounds very convenient.</s><s>Thank you.</s><s>Anything else I need to know?</s></speak>
<speak><s>Thank you for your help.</s><s>Until next time.</s></speak>
